item.title: Gadwal Registers 86.77% Turnout in First Phase of Gram Panchayat Elections
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The first phase of Gram Panchayat elections in four mandals of Jogulamba Gadwal district recorded an impressive 86.77% voter turnout, District Collector B.M. Santosh announced on Thursday.
Out of the total Gram Panchayats in the district, 14 were unanimously elected, while polling was conducted in the remaining 92 panchayats. Voting commenced at 7:00 AM, and officials monitored polling percentages at two-hour intervals.
According to the Collector, the polling percentage in Dharur Manda...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Big Story

item.title: Committee Formed to Select Site for New District Court Complex in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a significant development, the Honâ€™ble High Court has taken a considered and positive decision regarding the selection of land for the construction of the new District Court Complex in Jogulamba Gadwal district. Acting on long-pending representations and public aspirations, a committee has been constituted to identify a suitable site for the proposed court buildings.
